messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] writing (was:  a question and needing some reassuran...
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/17/02 11:47:13 AM Central Daylight Time, ... LOL! Sandra, you could take pictures of what you want at the store, (like that lady does in
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/17/02 11:47:13 AM Central Daylight Time,
SandraDodd@... writes:


> I could do the grocery list in my finest cursive, but my husband might
> rather
> I'd just print it with arrows and notes about what size and all... (he does
> the Costco shopping).
>

LOL! Sandra, you could take pictures of what you want at the store, (like
that lady does in that commercial) for your husband. Darin saw that and asked
why I don't do that for him!
~Nancy~Who after writing this thinks maybe she watches too much TV!


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
